creditFlashLoan(address,uint256,bytes).details: Reverts if `Flashlender` gets reentered in the same transaction

params.data: Arbitrary data structure, intended to contain user-defined parameters
params.receiver: Address of the receiver of the flash loan [ICreditFlashBorrower]

flashFee(address,uint256).details: If `token` is not Stablecoin then this method will revert

params.token: Address of the token to borrow (has to be the address of Stablecoin)

flashLoan(address,address,uint256,bytes).details: Reverts if `Flashlender` gets reentered in the same transaction or if token is not Stablecoin

params.data: Arbitrary data structure, intended to contain user-defined parameters
params.receiver: Address of the receiver of the flash loan
params.token: Address of the token to borrow (has to be the address of Stablecoin)

maxFlashLoan(address).details: If `token` is not Stablecoin then 0 is returned

params.token: Address of the token to borrow (has to be the address of Stablecoin)

flashFee(address,uint256).notice: Returns the current borrow fee for borrowing `amount` of `token`

maxFlashLoan(address).notice: Returns the maximum borrowable amount for `token`

protocolFee().notice: The flash loan fee, where WAD is 100%

documentation.text: @notice The flash loan fee, where WAD is 100%
